Hi all

I'm a new member..but have been a wargamer for 20 yrs...

i have finally got round to painting samurai for my favoutite 2 
battles.

Nagashino and Segikahara....

I can find lots of info but am struggling to find sashimono banners 
and kamon for both sides in each opf these battlers.

I have all the takeda ones from Magashino through various books but 
i need both sides from segikahara and Nobunaga's forces fron 
nagashino.

anyone help please.

ps anyone know any companies that produce decals of these banners.


Vini Vidi Vici do a small amount ?

thanks

gerry
